outputs.output_descr: This project is designed to provide critical bridging support to the Distance Teacher Education Programme (DTEP) through the provision of qualified UNV resources. DTEP, introduced in 2001, responds to the material needs for improvements in the quality and quantity of primary school teachers in Lesotho.

project_descr: This project is designed to provide critical bridging support to the Distance Teacher Education Programme (DTEP) through the provision of qualified UNV resources.
project_title: Support to Distance Teacher Education Programme
